          Installing Themes

          Instructions to install WordPress themes and their demos

          Installing Themes in WordPress

          To install a new WordPress theme on your website

          1. Make sure you’re logged in the WordPress admin panel, which is at your_domain/wp-admin/index.php

          2. Once you are in, go to Appearance > Themes.

          3. If you want to add a new theme, simply click on the Add New button.

          There are two ways to add a new theme:

          • install from the official WordPress theme repository
          • install from your local machine

          To simplify your search:

          • use the Search field if you know the theme’s name or its key words.
          • use the Feature Filter to search a theme according to colors, features and subjects.

          Installing Themes from the WordPress Repository

          • Scroll the page down to observe all the themes.

          NOTE: Use the Popular, Latest, and Favorites tabs to find more options.

          • Hover over the theme pane to observe theme details, preview and install it.

          • Click the Install button for installation.
          • Click the Activate link under the message for successful theme installation.

          Uploading Themes from Your Computer

          To upload a theme from your computer:

          • Go to your WordPress admin page > click the Upload Theme button to upload a theme from your local hard drive.

          • Click the Choose File button > select the archive of your theme from your computer > click the Install Now button.

          • Click the Activate link under the message for successful theme installation.

          Installing Demo Content

          With Pro versions of the 10Web themes, you can add demo content.

          • Click Appearance > Theme Options > Demo

          • You can either install Demo content or remove it using the following button:

          • Installing Themes in WordPress
          • Installing Themes from the WordPress Repository
          • Uploading Themes from Your Computer
